column1: PROPOSED APARTMENT PROJECT – SPACE ALLOCATION ANALYSIS (BASED ON USER DESIGN INPUT)
Gross building area (GBA) & gross floor area (GFA) analysis

column11: The building’s structural material and fire-resistance classification (e.g., Type V – wood, Type III – mixed, Type I – concrete/steel)
Lot Size / Parcel Area / Plot Area : The total land parcel area for the existing office site
The ratio of Gross Floor Area (GFA) to Lot Size for the proposed apartment project.
The total usable floor area that counts toward zoning FAR, excluding shafts, mechanical/electrical rooms, & other exempt spaces.
The total area of the proposed apartment measured to exterior walls, including all enclosed spaces before FAR exclusion (CBC).
The number of floors in the existing office.
The gross area of one standard floor in the proposed apartment, representing a typical level footprint.
The portion of the proposed apartment building that can be leased or rented to tenants.
The total area of the proposed apartment measured to exterior walls, including all enclosed spaces before FAR exclusions.
The efficiency ratio of the proposed apartment, calculated as Rentable Area ÷ Gross Building Area (GBA).

column1: Building Height and Story Distribution Summary

column11: The building height type for the proposed apartment (e.g., Low-Rise, Mid-Rise, High-Rise).
The building height of the proposed apartment from ground level to roof.
The building height of the proposed apartment from the lowest occupied basement floor to the ground level.
The number of above-ground floors in the new apartment.
The number of underground or basement floors for parking in the new apartment.
Total number of floors in the new apartment.
Floors used for residential dwelling units.
Floors used for mixed-use spaces (support area + indoor amenities + management…)
Floors allocated for parking + spaces/rooms in basements
Total number of floors in the new apartment.
Number of above-ground podium parking floors.
Number of underground or basement parking floors.
Floors allocated for parking + spaces/rooms in basements
Number of parking stalls located on ground level (open surface).
Number of parking stalls located above ground within the building podium.
Number of parking stalls located below ground level.
Number of parking stalls rented externally from other properties.
Total number of parking stalls required by zoning or code.
The clear width of the residential corridor
The net floor area of stair vestibules on a typical floor
The net floor area occupied by passenger elevator shafts on a typical floor
The net floor area occupied by freight elevator shafts in a typical floor
The net floor area occupied by stair shafts in a typical floor
The total number of passenger elevators in a typical floor
The total number of freight elevators in a typical floor
The total number of stairs in a typical floor
Indicates whether the apartment building design includes vertical trash chute system for waste disposal
Number of designated bicycle repair areas provided within the project
Number of short-term bicycle parking spaces located near building entrances for visitors
Number of long-term bicycle parking spaces in secure or covered areas for residents or staff

column2: Qty of W&D in com. laundry rm.
column11: Number of washer and dryer units installed in the common laundry room
Number of required parcel locker compartments provided for package deliveries
Number of tenant-specific modular spaces or functional units included in the project
Number of general or maintenance storage rooms allocated within the building
Number of janitorial storage closets provided for cleaning supplies and equipment

column2: Qty of cold storage delivery rm.
column11: Number of cold storage delivery rooms available for perishable goods
Number of parcel storage rooms designated for holding delivered packages

column2: Storage Rm. - Cold Storage Delivery Rm.
Trash - Trash room at res. Floor (Typ.)
Trash - Trash vestibules at res. floors (Typ.)

column11: Number of leasing office room provided for tenent services and leasing operations
Number of manager's office rooms designated for on-site building management
Number of security cameras installed within the project
Number of locker and shower facilities provided for building staff
The total area of shared outdoor or indoor open space required by LAMC for all residents
The total area of balconies, patios, or other open spaces reserved for the exclusive use of individual dwelling units
The minimum open space area mandated by the LAMC for the project
The maximum amount of recreation room space that can be counted toward indoor amenity requirements (LAMC)
The minimum outdoor amenity area that must be provided to meet project requirements
The total area of shared outdoor or indoor open space required by LAMC for all residents
The minimum indoor amenity area required by zoning or municipal code.
The portion of corridor area allocated or credited toward indoor amenity space
The estimated electrical demand load in kVA attributable to the residential portion of the building.
The estimated electrical demand load in kVA attributable to the non-residential portion of the building.
The combined total electrical demand load for both residential and non-residential areas, expressed in kVA
The total gross roof surface of the building, measured in square feet
The portion of the roof area suitable for photovoltaic panels after excluding setbacks, mechanical equipment

column2: Fan Room / Air Handling Unit (AHU) Room

column11: The maximum instantaneous demand for domestic (potable) water supply in the building
Indicates whether the building is equipped with an automatic fire sprinkler system
The required water supply rate for firefighting, expressed in gallons per minute (gpm)
